nodes.text: Blue Eight was the call sign of the eighth member of Blue Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several beings went by the name Blue Eight.

During the evacuation of Hoth, Beryann Raleg used the callsign. It was used by a Rebel Alliance fighter pilot stationed onboard the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Defiance who was killed in the months leading up to the Battle of Endor.
